text: Raikheda Thermal Power Station is a coal-based thermal power plant located in Raikheda village in Tilda Tehsil in Raipur district in the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. On 3 August 2019, Adani Power Limited took over control of the power plant from GMR Chhattisgarh Energy Ltd. ==Capacity== It is a 1370 MW (2×685 MW) project. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Unit No. !! Generating Capacity !! Commissioned on !! Status |- | 1 || 685 MW || 2016 February || Running |- | 2 || 685 MW || 2016 March || Running |- |} ==References== Category:Raipur district Category:Coal-fired power stations in Chhattisgarh
title: Raikheda Thermal Power Station
